decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - This development must be completed before 30 May 2019.

Condition : 2 - You must notify the Council that you have completed the work no later than 21 days after doing so, giving the name of the developer, the address of the property where the extension is and the date of completion.

Condition : 3 - The materials used on the external surfaces of the development shall match those used in the building to which it is attached in terms of style, colour, texture and, in the case of brickwork, bonding, coursing and pointing.

Condition : 4 - All openable parts of any side windows in the extension shall be more than 1.7 metres above finished floor level and permanently retained as such.
Any side windows shall be in obscure glazing and permanently retained as such.  Once built, no further side windows shall be installed.

Condition : 5 - It is noted that there is an approved planning application (01079/52/P3) relating to this site that has not yet been constructed.  This development shall not be implemented in conjunction with the extension referred to in decision 01079/52/P3 for the erection of a front porch and a two storey side and part rear extension to the house
description: Ground floor rear extension 6 metres deep, maximum height of 3.4 metres, 2.9 metres high to the eaves.
